quiz.question: What is Firebase Authentication primarily used for in mobile applications?
options: To manage user authentication and identity
quiz.hint: It helps in managing user sign-in and authentication processes.

quiz.question: Which Firebase service would you use to store and sync data in real-time across all connected clients?
quiz.hint: This service is known for real-time synchronization.

quiz.question: What is the main purpose of Cloud Functions for Firebase?
options: To execute backend code in response to events
quiz.hint: It allows you to run server-side code without managing servers.

quiz.question: How does Crashlytics help mobile developers?
options: By providing real-time crash reports and analytics
quiz.hint: It focuses on reporting and understanding app crashes.

quiz.question: Which Firebase feature would you use to gain insights into how users interact with your mobile app?
quiz.hint: This feature is dedicated to tracking user interactions and behaviors.
